t: Amazon.com: Teravan: Somnus Light Blocking Glasses
s: Teravan Somnus I glasses block close to 100% of both blue and green wavelengths. While many glasses block only blue light, recent studies have shown that lower wavelengths also have a significant effect on sleep patterns. We block all wavelengths below 550 nm, which includes blue, green and violet.
